Dear dez778803:
To work this type of file, just grab the first file and give it two clicks to open and he asked with which software you want to open it. Select WINRAR into your program files and then extract the ISO, which appears inside the folder and it will automatically extract the other files (002, 003, 004 on) Hope that helps.
